00113     SetGainBit( Data[11] );

00133   void Erase( int i )
00134   {
00135     _dataBunchXID.erase(_dataBunchXID.begin()+i);
00136     _dataCycleNr.erase(_dataCycleNr.begin()+i);
00137     _dataChipID.erase(_dataChipID.begin()+i); 
00138     _dataASICNr.erase(_dataASICNr.begin()+i); 
00139     _dataEvtNr.erase(_dataEvtNr.begin()+i);  
00140     _dataChannel.erase(_dataChannel.begin()+i);
00141     _dataTDC.erase(_dataTDC.begin()+i);    
00142     _dataADC.erase(_dataADC.begin()+i);    
00143     _dataXPos.erase(_dataXPos.begin()+i);   
00144     _dataYPos.erase(_dataYPos.begin()+i);   
00145     _dataHitBit.erase(_dataHitBit.begin()+i); 
00146     _dataGainBit.erase(_dataGainBit.begin()+i);
00147   }

00149   void Reverse ( void )
00150   {
00151     std::reverse(_dataBunchXID.begin(), _dataBunchXID.end());
00152     std::reverse(_dataCycleNr.begin(), _dataCycleNr.end());
00153     std::reverse(_dataChipID.begin(), _dataChipID.end());
00154     std::reverse(_dataASICNr.begin(), _dataASICNr.end());
00155     std::reverse(_dataEvtNr.begin(), _dataEvtNr.end());
00156     std::reverse(_dataChannel.begin(), _dataChannel.end());
00157     std::reverse(_dataTDC.begin(), _dataTDC.end());
00158     std::reverse(_dataADC.begin(), _dataADC.end());
00159     std::reverse(_dataXPos.begin(), _dataXPos.end());
00160     std::reverse(_dataYPos.begin(), _dataYPos.end());
00161     std::reverse(_dataHitBit.begin(), _dataHitBit.end());
00162     std::reverse(_dataGainBit.begin(), _dataGainBit.end());
00163   }
00164  
00165   void swapBunchXID ( void )
00166   {
00167     //swap the wrong order BunchXID in the Labview output
00168     //=======================================================         
00169     int NCHIPS = 0;
00170     std::vector<int> worngBunchXID[16];
00171     
00172     int ichip = -1;
00173     
00174     int iChipID =  0;
00175     int maxIndex =  _dataBunchXID.size();
00176     
00177     for( int i =0; i < maxIndex; i++)
00178       {
00179         if( iChipID != _dataChipID.at(i) )
00180           {
00181             ichip++;
00182             NCHIPS++;
00183             iChipID = _dataChipID.at(i);
00184           }
00185         worngBunchXID[ichip].push_back( _dataBunchXID.at(i) );
00186       }
00187     
00188     int maxCount = 0;;
00189     for(int ichip=0;ichip<NCHIPS;ichip++){
00190       maxCount += worngBunchXID[ichip].size();
00191     }
00192 
00193     std::cout<<"maxCount: "<<maxCount 
00194              <<" maxIndex: "<<maxIndex
00195              <<std::endl;
00196     
00197     if (maxCount == maxIndex ){
00198       
00199       int index = -1;
00200       for(int ichip=0;ichip<NCHIPS;ichip++){
00201         for (unsigned int k = 0 ; k < worngBunchXID[ichip].size(); k++){
00202           index++;
00203           _dataBunchXID[index] =
00204             worngBunchXID[ichip].at(worngBunchXID[ichip].size()-1-k);
00205         }
00206         
00207       }
00208       
00209       for(int ichip=0;ichip<NCHIPS;ichip++){
00210         worngBunchXID[ichip].clear();
00211       }
00212       
00213     }
00214     else {std::cout <<"ERROR: something is wrong in the swap Labview wrong BunchXID" <<std::endl;}
00215     
00216     //=======================================================         
00217     //End of the swap the wrong order BunchXID in the Labview output
00218     
00219   }
00220 
00221   void SwapEvtNr ( void )
00222   {
00223     //swap the wrong order EvtNr in the Labview output
00224     //=======================================================         
00225     int NCHIPS = 0;
00226     std::vector<int> worngEvtNr[16];
00227     
00228     int ichip = -1;
00229     
00230     int iChipID =  0;
00231     int maxIndex =  _dataEvtNr.size();
00232     
00233     for( int i =0; i < maxIndex; i++)
00234       {
00235         if( iChipID != _dataChipID.at(i) )
00236           {
00237             ichip++;
00238             NCHIPS++;
00239             iChipID = _dataChipID.at(i);
00240           }
00241         worngEvtNr[ichip].push_back( _dataEvtNr.at(i) );
00242       }
00243     
00244     int maxCount = 0;;
00245     for(int ichip=0;ichip<NCHIPS;ichip++){
00246       maxCount += worngEvtNr[ichip].size();
00247     }
00248 
00249     std::cout<<"maxCount: "<<maxCount 
00250              <<" maxIndex: "<<maxIndex
00251              <<std::endl;
00252     
00253     if (maxCount == maxIndex ){
00254       
00255       int index = -1;
00256       for(int ichip=0;ichip<NCHIPS;ichip++){
00257         for (unsigned int k = 0 ; k < worngEvtNr[ichip].size(); k++){
00258           index++;
00259           _dataEvtNr[index] =
00260             worngEvtNr[ichip].at(worngEvtNr[ichip].size()-1-k);
00261         }
00262         
00263       }
00264       
00265       for(int ichip=0;ichip<NCHIPS;ichip++){
00266         worngEvtNr[ichip].clear();
00267       }
00268       
00269     }
00270     else {std::cout <<"ERROR: something is wrong in the swap Labview wrong EvtNr" <<std::endl;}
00271     
00272     //=======================================================         
00273     //End of the swap the wrong order EvtNr in the Labview output
00274     
00275   }

00277   void PrintParameters(int i)
00278   {
00279 
00280     std::cout <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataBunchXID.at(i)
00281               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataCycleNr.at(i)
00282               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataChipID.at(i)
00283               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataASICNr.at(i)
00284               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataEvtNr.at(i)
00285               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataChannel.at(i)
00286               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataTDC.at(i)
00287               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataADC.at(i)
00288               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataXPos.at(i)
00289               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataYPos.at(i)
00290               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataHitBit.at(i)
00291               <<std::setw ( 5 )<<_dataGainBit.at(i)
00292               <<std::endl;
00293   }
